books.author: Virginia Roberts Giuffre
books.description: The late activist and advocate for sex-trafficking survivors describes her time with Jeffrey Epstein and Ghislaine Maxwell.
books.title: NOBODY'S GIRL

books.author: John Kennedy
books.description: The Republican senator from Louisiana shares stories about politics in Washington, D.C., and in his home state.
books.title: HOW TO TEST NEGATIVE FOR STUPID

books.author: Andrew Ross Sorkin
books.description: The New York Times journalist and CNBC host looks at the fight between Washington and Wall Street that fueled a historic crash of the stock market.

books.author: Peter Attia with Bill Gifford
books.contributor: by Peter Attia with Bill Gifford
books.description: A look at recent scientific research on aging and longevity.
books.title: OUTLIVE

books.author: Cameron Crowe
books.description: The journalist and Academy Award-winning filmmaker shares real-life events that inspired “Almost Famous.”
books.title: THE UNCOOL

books.author: Elyse Myers
books.description: A collection of stories and illustrations by the comedian and content creator.
books.title: THAT'S A GREAT QUESTION, I'D LOVE TO TELL YOU

books.author: Bret Baier with Catherine Whitney
books.contributor: by Bret Baier with Catherine Whitney
books.description: The Fox News Channel’s chief political anchor chronicles the life and times of Theodore Roosevelt.
books.title: TO RESCUE THE AMERICAN SPIRIT

books.author: Jonathan Karl
books.description: The chief Washington correspondent for ABC News and author of “Tired of Winning” chronicles President Trump’s return to the White House.
books.title: RETRIBUTION

books.author: Kamala Harris
books.description: The former vice president recounts her abbreviated campaign to become president in 2024.
books.title: 107 DAYS

books.author: Eric Trump
books.description: The executive vice president of the Trump Organization shares his belief that attacks on his family are attacks on America.
books.title: UNDER SIEGE

books.author: Matthew McConaughey
books.description: The actor and author of “Greenlights” explores elements of belief and reason that make up our lives.
books.title: POEMS & PRAYERS

books.author: Charlie Kirk
books.description: The late founder of Turning Point USA prescribes ways to defeat woke ideology.
books.title: RIGHT WING REVOLUTION

books.author: Shea Serrano
books.description: The author of “Hip-Hop (and Other Things)” celebrates moments in basketball that are hard to quantify; illustrated by Ian Klarer.
books.title: EXPENSIVE BASKETBALL

books.author: Bessel van der Kolk
books.description: How trauma affects the body and mind, and innovative treatments for recovery.
books.title: THE BODY KEEPS THE SCORE

books.author: Bill O'Reilly and Josh Hammer
books.contributor: by Bill O'Reilly and Josh Hammer
books.description: O'Reilly and Hammer profile some of history’s nefarious characters.
books.title: CONFRONTING EVIL
